org.jetel.data.formatter

Class AbstractFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.formatter.AbstractFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, Formatter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BinaryDataFormatter, ByteBufferFormatter, CloverDataFormatter, DataFormatter, DBFDataFormatter, DelimitedDataFormatter, FixLenDataFormatter, StructureFormatter, TextTableFormatter, TreeFormatter, XLSFormatter, XmlWriter.XmlFormatter, XSLTFormatter

    public abstract class AbstractFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Formatter
    Basic abstract implementation of Formatter interface.

      • setAppend

        public void setAppend(boolean append)
        Description copied from interface: Formatter
        This method should be used to inform formatter about type of writing to data target.
        Specified by:
        setAppend in interface Formatter
        Parameters:
        append - true if append mode of writing is used; false otherwise

      • getPreferredDataTargetType

        public Formatter.DataTargetType getPreferredDataTargetType()
        Description copied from interface: Formatter
        Formatter can request specific data target type, which is preferred to be passed into Formatter.setDataTarget(Object) method. This is intended just a hint for source provider, so other types of data targets should be expected.
        Specified by:
        getPreferredDataTargetType in interface Formatter

      • setAppendTargetNotEmpty

      • isDirect

        public boolean isDirect()
        Description copied from interface: Formatter
        Used in MultiFileWriter.writeDirect(CloverBuffer).
        Specified by:
        isDirect in interface Formatter
        Returns:
        true if Formatter.writeDirect(CloverBuffer) should be called instead of Formatter.write(DataRecord).
